Title: The Last Supper
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Philip Buiser, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norman agrees to get help; Dylan learns disturbing news about Emma's health.
